sn35:1.1.2: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn35:1.2.4: Yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn35:1.2.12: Yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn35:1.2.18: Yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn35:1.2.19: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, sotasmimpi nibbindati, ghānasmimpi nibbindati, jivhāyapi nibbindati, kāyasmimpi nibbindati, manasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35:1.2.20: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn35:1.2.21: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:2.1.3: yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.

sn35:4.1.12: Yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn35:4.1.13: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpesupi nibbindati, saddesupi nibbindati, gandhesupi nibbindati, rasesupi nibbindati, phoṭṭhabbesupi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati.
sn35:4.1.14: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn35:4.1.15: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.

sn35:7.1.3: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṃ cakkhusmiṃ anapekkho hoti;

sn35:13.1.2: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn35:13.1.3: ‘ko nu kho cakkhussa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
sn35:13.1.8: ko manassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan’ti?
sn35:13.1.10: ‘yaṃ kho cakkhuṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ cakkhussa assādo.
sn35:13.1.11: Yaṃ cakkhuṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, ayaṃ cakkhussa ādīnavo.
sn35:13.1.12: Yo cakkhusmiṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ cakkhussa nissaraṇaṃ.
sn35:13.1.15: yaṃ jivhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ jivhāya assādo.
sn35:13.1.16: Yaṃ jivhā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ jivhāya ādīnavo.
sn35:13.1.17: Yo jivhāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ jivhāya nissaraṇaṃ.
sn35:13.1.19: yaṃ manaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ manassa assādo.
sn35:13.1.20: Yaṃ mano anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo, ayaṃ manassa ādīnavo.
sn35:13.1.21: Yo manasmiṃ chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ manassa nissaraṇan’ti.
sn35:13.2.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ evaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
sn35:13.2.2: Yato ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ evaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
sn35:13.2.4: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn35:14.1.1: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn35:14.1.2: ‘ko nu kho rūpānaṃ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
sn35:14.1.7: ko dhammānaṃ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan’ti?
sn35:14.1.9: ‘yaṃ kho rūpe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ rūpānaṃ assādo.
sn35:14.1.10: Yaṃ rūpā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ rūpānaṃ ādīnavo.
sn35:14.1.11: Yo rūpesu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ.
sn35:14.1.16: yaṃ dhamme paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ dhammānaṃ assādo.
sn35:14.1.17: Yaṃ dhammā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ dhammānaṃ ādīnavo.
sn35:14.1.18: Yo dhammesu chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ dhammānaṃ nissaraṇan’ti.
sn35:14.2.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ evaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
sn35:14.2.2: Yato ca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ evaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paccaññāsiṃ.
sn35:14.2.4: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn35:15.1.3: Yāvatā cakkhussa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:15.1.6: Yāvatā cakkhussa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:15.1.9: Yāvatā cakkhussa nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35:15.1.14: Yāvatā jivhāya assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:15.1.17: Yāvatā jivhāya ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:15.1.20: Yāvatā jivhāya nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ …pe…
sn35:15.1.23: Yāvatā manassa assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:15.1.26: Yāvatā manassa ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:15.1.29: Yāvatā manassa nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35:15.2.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ …pe…
sn35:15.2.4: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn35:16.1.3: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:16.1.6: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:16.1.9: Yāvatā rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35:16.1.16: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:16.1.19: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn35:16.1.22: Yāvatā dhammānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, paññāya me taṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ.
sn35:16.2.1: Yāvakīvañcāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ channaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññāsiṃ …pe… paccaññāsiṃ.
sn35:16.2.3: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn35:17.1.1: “No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, cakkhussa assādo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā cakkhusmiṃ sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.2: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi cakkhussa assādo tasmā sattā cakkhusmiṃ sārajjanti.
sn35:17.1.3: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, cakkhussa ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā cakkhusmiṃ nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi cakkhussa ādīnavo tasmā sattā cakkhusmiṃ nibbindanti.
sn35:17.1.5: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, cakkhussa nissaraṇaṃ abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā cakkhusmā nissareyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.6: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi cakkhussa nissaraṇaṃ tasmā sattā cakkhusmā nissaranti.
sn35:17.1.7: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, sotassa assādo abhavissa …
sn35:17.1.8: no cedaṃ, bhikkhave, ghānassa assādo abhavissa …
sn35:17.1.9: no cedaṃ, bhikkhave, jivhāya assādo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā jivhāya sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.10: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi jivhāya assādo, tasmā sattā jivhāya sārajjanti.
sn35:17.1.11: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, jivhāya ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā jivhāya nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.12: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi jivhāya ādīnavo, tasmā sattā jivhāya nibbindanti.
sn35:17.1.13: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, jivhāya nissaraṇaṃ abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā jivhāya nissareyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.14: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi jivhāya nissaraṇaṃ, tasmā sattā jivhāya nissaranti.
sn35:17.1.15: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, kāyassa assādo abhavissa …
sn35:17.1.16: no cedaṃ, bhikkhave, manassa assādo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā manasmiṃ sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.17: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi manassa assādo, tasmā sattā manasmiṃ sārajjanti.
sn35:17.1.18: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, manassa ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā manasmiṃ nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.19: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi manassa ādīnavo, tasmā sattā manasmiṃ nibbindanti.
sn35:17.1.20: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, manassa nissaraṇaṃ abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā manasmā nissareyyuṃ.
sn35:17.1.21: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi manassa nissaraṇaṃ, tasmā sattā manasmā nissaranti.
sn35:17.2.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, sattā imesaṃ channaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññaṃsu, neva tāva, bhikkhave, sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaññuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā vihariṃsu.
sn35:17.2.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, sattā imesaṃ channaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññaṃsu, atha, bhikkhave, sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaññuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharantī”ti.
sn35:18.1.1: “No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpānaṃ assādo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā rūpesu sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn35:18.1.2: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rūpānaṃ assādo, tasmā sattā rūpesu sārajjanti.
sn35:18.1.3: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpānaṃ ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā rūpesu nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn35:18.1.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rūpānaṃ ādīnavo, tasmā sattā rūpesu nibbindanti.
sn35:18.1.5: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā rūpehi nissareyyuṃ.
sn35:18.1.6: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rūpānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, tasmā sattā rūpehi nissaranti.
sn35:18.1.11: dhammānaṃ assādo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā dhammesu sārajjeyyuṃ.
sn35:18.1.12: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi dhammānaṃ assādo, tasmā sattā dhammesu sārajjanti.
sn35:18.1.13: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā dhammesu nibbindeyyuṃ.
sn35:18.1.14: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi dhammānaṃ ādīnavo, tasmā sattā dhammesu nibbindanti.
sn35:18.1.15: No cedaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ abhavissa, nayidaṃ sattā dhammehi nissareyyuṃ.
sn35:18.1.16: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi dhammānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, tasmā sattā dhammehi nissaranti.
sn35:18.2.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, sattā imesaṃ channaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ nābbhaññaṃsu, neva tāva, bhikkhave, sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaññuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā vihariṃsu.
sn35:18.2.2: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, sattā imesaṃ channaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ assādañca assādato, ādīnavañca ādīnavato, nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññaṃsu, atha, bhikkhave, sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaññuttā vippamuttā vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharantī”ti.
sn35:19.1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, cakkhuṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn35:19.1.2: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35:19.1.5: yo jivhaṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn35:19.1.6: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35:19.1.8: yo manaṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn35:19.1.9: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35:19.2.1: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhuṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn35:19.2.2: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35:19.2.5: yo jivhaṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn35:19.2.6: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35:19.2.8: yo manaṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn35:19.2.9: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35:20.1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpe abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn35:20.1.2: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn35:20.1.8: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35:20.2.1: “Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpe nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn35:20.2.2: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35:20.2.8: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmā”ti vadāmi.
sn35:21.1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, cakkhussa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṃ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn35:21.1.6: yo manassa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṃ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn35:21.2.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhussa nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo.
sn35:21.2.6: yo manassa nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
sn35:22.1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpānaṃ uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṃ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn35:22.1.6: yo dhammānaṃ uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo, dukkhasseso uppādo, rogānaṃ ṭhiti, jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn35:22.2.1: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpānaṃ nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo.
sn35:22.2.6: yo dhammānaṃ nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
sn35:23.1.5: Cakkhuñceva rūpā ca, sotañca saddā ca, ghānañca gandhā ca, jivhā ca rasā ca, kāyo ca phoṭṭhabbā ca, mano ca dhammā ca—
sn35:23.1.8: ‘ahametaṃ sabbaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ sabbaṃ paññāpessāmī’ti, tassa vācāvatthukamevassa;
sn35:23.1.9: puṭṭho ca na sampāyeyya, uttariñca vighātaṃ āpajjeyya.
sn35:24.1.4: Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, pahātabbaṃ, rūpā pahātabbā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ pahātabbaṃ, cakkhusamphasso pahātabbo, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi pahātabbaṃ …pe…
sn35:24.1.6: jivhā pahātabbā, rasā pahātabbā, jivhāviññāṇaṃ pahātabbaṃ, jivhāsamphasso pahātabbo, yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi pahātabbaṃ.
sn35:24.1.8: mano pahātabbo, dhammā pahātabbā, manoviññāṇaṃ pahātabbaṃ, manosamphasso pahātabbo, yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi pahātabbaṃ.
sn35:25.1.1: “Sabbaṃ abhiññā pariññā pahānāya vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi.
sn35:25.1.3: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ abhiññā pariññā pahānāya dhammo?
sn35:25.1.4: Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññā pariññā pahātabbaṃ, rūpā abhiññā pariññā pahātabbā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ abhiññā pariññā pahātabbaṃ, cakkhusamphasso abhiññā pariññā pahātabbo, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi abhiññā pariññā pahātabbaṃ …pe…
sn35:25.1.6: jivhā abhiññā pariññā pahātabbā, rasā abhiññā pariññā pahātabbā, jivhāviññāṇaṃ abhiññā pariññā pahātabbaṃ, jivhāsamphasso abhiññā pariññā pahātabbo, yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi abhiññā pariññā pahātabbaṃ.
sn35:25.1.8: mano abhiññā pariññā pahātabbo, dhammā abhiññā pariññā pahātabbā, manoviññāṇaṃ abhiññā pariññā pahātabbaṃ, manosamphasso abhiññā pariññā pahātabbo, yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi abhiññā pariññā pahātabbaṃ.
sn35:25.1.9: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ abhiññā pariññā pahānāya dhammo”ti.
sn35:26.1.1: “Sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.2: Kiñca, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya?
sn35:26.1.3: Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.4: Rūpe anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.5: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.6: Cakkhusamphassaṃ anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.7: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya …pe…
sn35:26.1.8: jivhaṃ anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.12: yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.14: manaṃ anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.18: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.1.19: Idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.1: Sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.2: Kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya?
sn35:26.2.3: Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.4: Rūpe abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.5: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.6: Cakkhusamphassaṃ abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.7: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya …pe…
sn35:26.2.8: jivhaṃ abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.12: yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.14: manaṃ abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.18: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:26.2.19: Idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
sn35:27.1.1: “Sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:27.1.2: Kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya?
sn35:27.1.3: Yañca, bhikkhave, cakkhu, ye ca rūpā, yañca cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, ye ca cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā …pe…
sn35:27.1.4: yā ca jivhā, ye ca rasā, yañca jivhāviññāṇaṃ, ye ca jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā;
sn35:27.1.5: yo ca kāyo, ye ca phoṭṭhabbā, yañca kāyaviññāṇaṃ, ye ca kāyaviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā;
sn35:27.1.6: yo ca mano, ye ca dhammā, yañca manoviññāṇaṃ, ye ca manoviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā—
sn35:27.1.7: idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:27.2.1: Sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya.
sn35:27.2.2: Kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāya?
sn35:27.2.3: Yañca, bhikkhave, cakkhu, ye ca rūpā, yañca cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, ye ca cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā …pe…
sn35:27.2.4: yā ca jivhā, ye ca rasā, yañca jivhāviññāṇaṃ, ye ca jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā;
sn35:27.2.5: yo ca kāyo, ye ca phoṭṭhabbā, yañca kāyaviññāṇaṃ, ye ca kāyaviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā;
sn35:27.2.6: yo ca mano, ye ca dhammā, yañca manoviññāṇaṃ, ye ca manoviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā—
sn35:27.2.7: idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
sn35:28.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati gayāsīse saddhiṃ bhikkhusahassena.
sn35:28.1.5: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, rūpā ādittā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, cakkhusamphasso āditto. Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
sn35:28.1.7: ‘Rāgagginā, dosagginā, mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittan’ti vadāmi …pe…
sn35:28.1.8: jivhā ādittā, rasā ādittā, jivhāviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, jivhāsamphasso āditto. Yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
sn35:28.1.10: ‘Rāgagginā, dosagginā, mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittan’ti vadāmi …pe…
sn35:28.1.11: mano āditto, dhammā ādittā, manoviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, manosamphasso āditto. Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
sn35:28.1.13: ‘Rāgagginā, dosagginā, mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittan’ti vadāmi.
sn35:28.1.14: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati …pe…
sn35:28.1.15: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35:28.1.16: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn35:28.1.17: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:28.2.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanduṃ.
sn35:28.2.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti.
sn35:29.1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn35:29.1.6: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, addhabhūtaṃ, rūpā addhabhūtā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ addhabhūtaṃ, cakkhusamphasso addhabhūto, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi addhabhūtaṃ.
sn35:29.1.8: ‘Jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi addhabhūtan’ti vadāmi …pe…
sn35:29.1.9: jivhā addhabhūtā, rasā addhabhūtā, jivhāviññāṇaṃ addhabhūtaṃ, jivhāsamphasso addhabhūto, yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi addhabhūtaṃ.
sn35:29.1.11: ‘Jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi addhabhūtan’ti vadāmi.
sn35:29.1.13: mano addhabhūto, dhammā addhabhūtā, manoviññāṇaṃ addhabhūtaṃ, manosamphasso addhabhūto, yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi addhabhūtaṃ.
sn35:29.1.15: ‘Jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi addhabhūtan’ti vadāmi.
sn35:29.1.16: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati …pe…
sn35:29.1.17: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35:29.1.18: Nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṃ ‘vimuttam’iti ñāṇaṃ hoti,
sn35:29.1.19: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:30.1.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmīti.
sn35:30.1.3: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, sabbamaññitasamugghātasāruppā paṭipadā?
sn35:30.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuṃ na maññati, cakkhusmiṃ na maññati, cakkhuto na maññati, cakkhuṃ meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.5: Rūpe na maññati, rūpesu na maññati, rūpato na maññati, rūpā meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.6: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na maññati, cakkhuviññāṇasmiṃ na maññati, cakkhuviññāṇato na maññati, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.7: Cakkhusamphassaṃ na maññati, cakkhusamphassasmiṃ na maññati, cakkhusamphassato na maññati, cakkhusamphasso meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.8: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññati, tasmimpi na maññati, tatopi na maññati, taṃ meti na maññati …pe…
sn35:30.1.9: jivhaṃ na maññati, jivhāya na maññati, jivhāto na maññati, jivhā meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.10: Rase na maññati, rasesu na maññati, rasato na maññati, rasā meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.11: Jivhāviññāṇaṃ na maññati, jivhāviññāṇasmiṃ na maññati, jivhāviññāṇato na maññati, jivhāviññāṇaṃ meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.12: Jivhāsamphassaṃ na maññati, jivhāsamphassasmiṃ na maññati, jivhāsamphassato na maññati, jivhāsamphasso meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.13: Yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññati, tasmimpi na maññati, tatopi na maññati, taṃ meti na maññati …pe…
sn35:30.1.14: manaṃ na maññati, manasmiṃ na maññati, manato na maññati, mano meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.15: Dhamme na maññati, dhammesu na maññati, dhammato na maññati, dhammā meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.16: Manoviññāṇaṃ na maññati, manoviññāṇasmiṃ na maññati, manoviññāṇato na maññati, manoviññāṇaṃ meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.17: Manosamphassaṃ na maññati, manosamphassasmiṃ na maññati, manosamphassato na maññati, manosamphasso meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.18: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññati, tasmimpi na maññati, tatopi na maññati, taṃ meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.19: Sabbaṃ na maññati, sabbasmiṃ na maññati, sabbato na maññati, sabbaṃ meti na maññati.
sn35:30.1.20: So evaṃ amaññamāno na ca kiñci loke upādiyati.
sn35:30.1.21: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassati. Aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn35:30.1.22: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.

sn35:31.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuṃ na maññati, cakkhusmiṃ na maññati, cakkhuto na maññati, cakkhuṃ meti na maññati.

sn35:31.1.7: Yañhi, bhikkhave, maññati, yasmiṃ maññati, yato maññati, yaṃ meti maññati, tato taṃ hoti aññathā.

sn35:53.1.3: “kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, jānato kathaṃ passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti?

sn35:63.2.1: “Santi kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.

sn35:63.2.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35:63.2.6: Nandisaṃyojanasaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu sadutiyavihārīti vuccati.
sn35:63.2.8: Santi kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:63.2.9: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35:63.2.10: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35:63.2.13: Nandisaṃyojanasaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu sadutiyavihārīti vuccati.
sn35:63.2.14: Evaṃvihārī ca, migajāla, bhikkhu kiñcāpi araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni;
sn35:63.3.1: Santi ca kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:63.3.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35:63.3.3: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35:63.3.6: Nandisaṃyojanavisaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu ekavihārīti vuccati …pe…
sn35:63.3.7: santi ca kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā …pe…
sn35:63.3.8: santi ca kho, migajāla, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:63.3.9: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35:63.3.10: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35:63.3.13: Nandisaṃyojanavippayutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu ekavihārīti vuccati.
sn35:63.3.14: Evaṃvihārī ca, migajāla, bhikkhu kiñcāpi gāmante viharati ākiṇṇo bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi.
sn35:64.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn35:64.1.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā migajālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:64.1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35:64.2.1: “Santi kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.

sn35:64.3.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati. Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.

sn35:64.3.6: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati. Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35:64.4.1: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn35:64.4.2: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharato nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn35:64.4.3: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn35:64.4.4: Aññataro ca panāyasmā migajālo arahataṃ ahosīti.
sn35:65.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn35:65.1.2: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi yena bhagavā …pe…
sn35:65.1.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, māro vā assa mārapaññatti vā”ti?
sn35:65.2.1: “Yattha kho, samiddhi, atthi cakkhu, atthi rūpā, atthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, atthi cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
sn35:65.2.2: Atthi sotaṃ, atthi saddā, atthi sotaviññāṇaṃ, atthi sotaviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
sn35:65.2.3: Atthi ghānaṃ, atthi gandhā, atthi ghānaviññāṇaṃ, atthi ghānaviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
sn35:65.2.4: Atthi jivhā, atthi rasā, atthi jivhāviññāṇaṃ, atthi jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
sn35:65.2.5: Atthi kāyo, atthi phoṭṭhabbā, atthi kāyaviññāṇaṃ, atthi kāyaviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
sn35:65.2.6: Atthi mano, atthi dhammā, atthi manoviññāṇaṃ, atthi manoviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
sn35:65.3.1: Yattha ca kho, samiddhi, natthi cakkhu, natthi rūpā, natthi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, natthi cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, natthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
sn35:65.3.4: natthi jivhā, natthi rasā, natthi jivhāviññāṇaṃ, natthi jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, natthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā.
sn35:65.3.6: Natthi mano, natthi dhammā, natthi manoviññāṇaṃ, natthi manoviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, natthi tattha māro vā mārapaññatti vā”ti.
sn35:66.1.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, satto vā assa sattapaññatti vā”ti …pe….
sn35:67.1.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dukkhaṃ vā assa dukkhapaññatti vā”ti …pe….

sn35:68.1.5: atthi mano, atthi dhammā, atthi manoviññāṇaṃ, atthi manoviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, atthi tattha loko vā lokapaññatti vā.

sn35:68.2.3: natthi mano, natthi dhammā, natthi manoviññāṇaṃ, natthi manoviññāṇaviññātabbā dhammā, natthi tattha loko vā lokapaññatti vā”ti.
sn35:69.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca upaseno rājagahe viharanti sītavane sappasoṇḍikapabbhāre.
sn35:69.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upasenassa kāye āsīviso patito hoti.
sn35:69.1.3: Atha kho āyasmā upaseno bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn35:69.1.4: “etha me, āvuso, imaṃ kāyaṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā bahiddhā nīharatha.
sn35:69.2.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:69.2.2: “na kho pana mayaṃ passāma āyasmato upasenassa kāyassa vā aññathattaṃ indriyānaṃ vā vipariṇāmaṃ.
sn35:69.2.4: ‘etha me, āvuso, imaṃ kāyaṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā bahiddhā nīharatha.
sn35:69.2.9: ahaṃ jivhāti vā mama jivhāti vā …
sn35:69.2.10: ahaṃ manoti vā mama mano’ti vā.
sn35:69.2.11: Tassa, āvuso sāriputta, siyā kāyassa vā aññathattaṃ indriyānaṃ vā vipariṇāmo.
sn35:69.2.12: Mayhañca kho, āvuso sāriputta, na evaṃ hoti:
sn35:69.2.14: ahaṃ jivhāti vā mama jivhāti vā …pe…
sn35:69.2.15: ahaṃ manoti vā mama manoti vā’.
sn35:69.2.16: Tassa mayhañca kho, āvuso sāriputta, kiṃ kāyassa vā aññathattaṃ bhavissati, indriyānaṃ vā vipariṇāmo”ti.
sn35:69.3.1: Tathā hi panāyasmato upasenassa dīgharattaṃ ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayo susamūhato.
sn35:69.3.2: Tasmā āyasmato upasenassa na evaṃ hoti:
sn35:69.3.4: ahaṃ jivhāti vā mama jivhāti vā …pe…
sn35:69.3.5: ahaṃ manoti vā mama mano’ti vā”ti.
sn35:69.3.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato upasenassa kāyaṃ mañcakaṃ āropetvā bahiddhā nīhariṃsu.
sn35:69.3.7: Atha kho āyasmato upasenassa kāyo tattheva vikiri;
sn35:70.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā upavāṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn35:70.1.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā upavāṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:70.1.4: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti, akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti?
sn35:70.2.1: “Idha pana, upavāṇa, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rūpappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35:70.2.2: Santañca ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35:70.2.3: Yaṃ taṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rūpappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35:70.2.4: Santañca ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35:70.2.5: Evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi …pe….
sn35:70.3.1: Puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā rasappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti rasarāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35:70.3.2: Santañca ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35:70.3.3: Yaṃ taṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā rasappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti rasarāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35:70.3.4: Santañca ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ rasesu rāgo’ti pajānāti. Evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi …pe….
sn35:70.4.1: Puna caparaṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu manasā dhammaṃ viññāya dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammarāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35:70.4.2: Santañca ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35:70.4.3: Yaṃ taṃ, upavāṇa, bhikkhu manasā dhammaṃ viññāya dhammappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammarāgappaṭisaṃvedī ca.
sn35:70.4.4: Santañca ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgaṃ ‘atthi me ajjhattaṃ dhammesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.
sn35:70.4.5: Evampi kho, upavāṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hoti …pe… paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi …pe….
sn35:70.5.1: Idha pana, upavāṇa, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rūpappaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti, no ca rūparāgappaṭisaṃvedī.
sn35:70.5.2: Asantañca ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgaṃ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.

sn35:70.5.4: Asantañca ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgaṃ ‘natthi me ajjhattaṃ rūpesu rāgo’ti pajānāti.

sn35:71.1.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn35:71.1.2: Avusitaṃ tena brahmacariyaṃ, ārakā so imasmā dhammavinayā”ti.
sn35:71.2.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:71.2.3: Ahañhi, bhante, channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāmī”ti.
sn35:71.3.2: cakkhuṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35:71.5.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, cakkhu ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.
sn35:71.5.3: jivhaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35:71.7.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, jivhā ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.
sn35:71.7.3: manaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35:71.9.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, mano ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.

sn35:73.1.2: Avusitaṃ tena brahmacariyaṃ, ārakā so imasmā dhammavinayā”ti.

sn35:73.2.3: Ahañhi, bhante, channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāmī”ti.
sn35:73.5.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:73.7.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:73.11.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:73.13.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:73.15.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhu, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, sotasmimpi nibbindati, ghānasmimpi nibbindati, jivhāyapi nibbindati, kāyasmimpi nibbindati, manasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35:73.15.2: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn35:73.15.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:74.1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:74.1.3: “amukasmiṃ, bhante, vihāre aññataro bhikkhu navo appaññāto ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn35:74.1.4: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
sn35:74.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā navavādañca sutvā gilānavādañca, “appaññāto bhikkhū”ti iti viditvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami.
sn35:74.2.2: Addasā kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn35:74.2.4: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn35:74.2.8: Nisajja kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn35:74.2.9: “kacci te, bhikkhu, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35:74.3.1: “Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo”ti.
sn35:74.4.1: “Kacci te, bhikkhu, na kiñci kukkuccaṃ, na koci vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn35:74.5.1: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakaṃ kukkuccaṃ, anappako vippaṭisāro”ti.
sn35:74.6.1: “Kacci pana taṃ, bhikkhu, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti?
sn35:74.7.1: “Na kho maṃ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn35:74.8.1: “No ce kira te, bhikkhu, attā sīlato upavadati, atha kiñca te kukkuccaṃ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn35:74.9.1: “Na khvāhaṃ, bhante, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35:74.10.1: “No ce kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi, atha kimatthaṃ carahi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn35:74.11.1: “Rāgavirāgatthaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35:74.12.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, rāgavirāgatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi.
sn35:74.12.3: Rāgavirāgattho hi, bhikkhu, mayā dhammo desito.
sn35:74.16.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:74.18.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:74.20.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhu, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, sotasmimpi nibbindati …pe… manasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35:74.20.2: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn35:74.21.2: Attamano so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
sn35:74.21.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhuno virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi:
sn35:75.1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu …pe… bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:75.1.2: “amukasmiṃ, bhante, vihāre aññataro bhikkhu navo appaññāto ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn35:75.1.3: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
sn35:75.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā navavādañca sutvā gilānavādañca, “appaññāto bhikkhū”ti iti viditvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami.
sn35:75.2.2: Addasā kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn35:75.2.4: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn35:75.2.7: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Nisajja kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
sn35:75.2.8: “kacci te, bhikkhu, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35:75.3.2: na kho maṃ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn35:75.4.1: “No ce kira te, bhikkhu, attā sīlato upavadati, atha kiñca te kukkuccaṃ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn35:75.5.1: “Na khvāhaṃ, bhante, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35:75.6.1: “No ce kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sīlavisuddhatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi, atha kimatthaṃ carahi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn35:75.7.1: “Anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35:75.8.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi.
sn35:75.8.3: Anupādāparinibbānattho hi, bhikkhu, mayā dhammo desito.
sn35:75.11.9: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:75.13.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:75.15.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:75.17.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhu, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe…
sn35:75.17.5: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35:75.17.6: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn35:75.17.7: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:75.18.2: Attamano so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
sn35:75.18.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhussa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccīti.
sn35:76.1.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:76.1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35:76.1.4: “Yaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:76.1.5: Kiñca, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo?
sn35:76.1.8: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35:76.1.11: mano anicco. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:76.1.15: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:76.1.16: Yaṃ kho, rādha, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
sn35:77.1.1: “Yaṃ kho, rādha, dukkhaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:77.1.3: Cakkhu kho, rādha, dukkhaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:77.1.7: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassa …pe… adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo …pe…
sn35:77.1.12: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:77.1.13: Yaṃ kho, rādha, dukkhaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
sn35:78.1.1: “Yo kho, rādha, anattā tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:78.1.3: Cakkhu kho, rādha, anattā. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:78.1.12: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anattā. Tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35:78.1.13: Yo kho, rādha, anattā tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
sn35:79.1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn35:79.1.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:79.1.3: “atthi nu kho, bhante, eko dhammo yassa pahānā bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti?
sn35:79.2.1: “Atthi kho, bhikkhu, eko dhammo yassa pahānā bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti.
sn35:79.3.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, eko dhammo yassa pahānā bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti?
sn35:79.4.1: “Avijjā kho, bhikkhu, eko dhammo yassa pahānā bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti.
sn35:79.5.1: “Kathaṃ pana, bhante, jānato, kathaṃ passato bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti?
sn35:79.6.1: “Cakkhuṃ kho, bhikkhu, aniccato jānato passato bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati. Rūpe … cakkhuviññāṇaṃ … cakkhusamphassaṃ …
sn35:79.6.2: yampidaṃ, cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati …pe…
sn35:79.6.3: manaṃ aniccato jānato passato bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati. Dhamme … manoviññāṇaṃ … manosamphassaṃ …
sn35:79.6.4: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
sn35:79.6.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti.
sn35:80.1.2: “atthi nu kho, bhante, eko dhammo yassa pahānā bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti?
sn35:80.2.1: “Atthi kho, bhikkhu, eko dhammo yassa pahānā bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti.
sn35:80.3.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, eko dhammo yassa pahānā bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti?
sn35:80.4.1: “Avijjā kho, bhikkhu, eko dhammo yassa pahānā bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti.
sn35:80.5.1: “Kathaṃ pana, bhante, jānato, kathaṃ passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti?
sn35:80.6.5: So sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānāti, sabbaṃ dhammaṃ abhiññāya sabbaṃ dhammaṃ parijānāti, sabbaṃ dhammaṃ pariññāya sabbanimittāni aññato passati, cakkhuṃ aññato passati, rūpe …
sn35:80.6.8: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aññato passati …pe…
sn35:80.6.12: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aññato passati.
sn35:80.6.13: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato bhikkhuno avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti.
sn35:81.1.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn35:81.1.2: “idha no, bhante, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā amhe evaṃ pucchanti:
sn35:81.1.4: Evaṃ puṭṭhā mayaṃ, bhante, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākaroma:
sn35:81.1.5: ‘dukkhassa kho, āvuso, pariññatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti.
sn35:81.1.6: Kacci mayaṃ, bhante, evaṃ puṭṭhā evaṃ byākaramānā vuttavādino ceva bhagavato homa, na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhāma, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākaroma, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchatī”ti?
sn35:81.2.1: “Taggha tumhe, bhikkhave, evaṃ puṭṭhā evaṃ byākaramānā vuttavādino ceva me hotha, na ca maṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhatha, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarotha, na ca koci sahadhammiko vādānuvādo gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati.
sn35:81.2.2: Dukkhassa hi, bhikkhave, pariññatthaṃ mayi brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
sn35:81.2.3: Sace pana vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
sn35:81.2.4: ‘katamaṃ pana taṃ, āvuso, dukkhaṃ, yassa pariññāya samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti?
sn35:81.2.5: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
sn35:81.2.6: ‘cakkhu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ, tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati.
sn35:81.2.8: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ.
sn35:81.2.11: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi dukkhaṃ.
sn35:81.2.13: Idaṃ kho taṃ, āvuso, dukkhaṃ, tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti.
sn35:81.2.14: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyāthā”ti.
sn35:82.1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:82.2.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, lokoti vuccatī”ti?
sn35:82.2.6: Rūpā lujjanti, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ lujjati, cakkhusamphasso lujjati, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi lujjati …pe…
sn35:82.2.8: mano lujjati, dhammā lujjanti, manoviññāṇaṃ lujjati, manosamphasso lujjati, yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi lujjati.
sn35:82.2.9: Lujjatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā lokoti vuccatī”ti.
sn35:83.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā phagguno …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā phagguno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:83.2.1: “Atthi nu kho, bhante, taṃ cakkhu, yena cakkhunā atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivaṭṭe paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya …pe…
sn35:83.2.2: atthi nu kho, bhante, sā jivhā, yāya jivhāya atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivaṭṭe paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya …pe…
sn35:83.2.3: atthi nu kho so, bhante, mano, yena manena atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivaṭṭe paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyā”ti?
sn35:83.3.1: “Natthi kho taṃ, phagguna, cakkhu, yena cakkhunā atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivaṭṭe paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya …pe…
sn35:83.3.2: natthi kho sā, phagguna, jivhā, yāya jivhāya atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivaṭṭe paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya …pe…
sn35:83.3.3: natthi kho so, phagguna, mano, yena manena atīte buddhe parinibbute chinnapapañce chinnavaṭume pariyādinnavaṭṭe sabbadukkhavītivaṭṭe paññāpayamāno paññāpeyyā”ti.
sn35:84.1.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:84.2.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, lokoti vuccatī”ti?
sn35:84.2.3: “Yaṃ kho, ānanda, palokadhammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati ariyassa vinaye loko.
sn35:84.2.5: Cakkhu kho, ānanda, palokadhammaṃ, rūpā palokadhammā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ palokadhammaṃ, cakkhusamphasso palokadhammo, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā …pe… tampi palokadhammaṃ …pe…
sn35:84.2.6: jivhā palokadhammā, rasā palokadhammā, jivhāviññāṇaṃ palokadhammaṃ, jivhāsamphasso palokadhammo, yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā …pe… tampi palokadhammaṃ …pe…
sn35:84.2.7: mano palokadhammo, dhammā palokadhammā, manoviññāṇaṃ palokadhammaṃ, manosamphasso palokadhammo, yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi palokadhammaṃ.
sn35:84.2.8: Yaṃ kho, ānanda, palokadhammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati ariyassa vinaye loko”ti.
sn35:85.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando …pe… bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:85.1.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, suñño lokoti vuccatī”ti?
sn35:85.1.4: “Yasmā ca kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā tasmā suñño lokoti vuccati.
sn35:85.1.5: Kiñca, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā?
sn35:85.1.6: Cakkhu kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.
sn35:85.1.7: Rūpā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā, cakkhusamphasso suñño attena vā attaniyena vā …pe…
sn35:85.1.8: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā.
sn35:85.1.9: Yasmā ca kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā, tasmā suñño lokoti vuccatī”ti.
sn35:86.1.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:86.1.2: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35:86.4.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:86.6.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:86.10.2: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:86.12.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:86.14.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:86.18.3: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:86.20.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:86.22.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:86.24.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, ānanda, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe… cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati …pe…
sn35:86.24.2: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35:86.24.3: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn35:86.24.4: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:87.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn35:87.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmā ca channo gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
sn35:87.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena yena āyasmā channo ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn35:87.1.4: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahācundo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahācundaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:87.1.6: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā mahācundo āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
sn35:87.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo yenāyasmā channo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdiṃsu. Nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:87.2.2: “kacci te, āvuso channa, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35:87.3.1: “Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo.
sn35:87.3.2: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evameva kho, āvuso, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
sn35:87.3.3: Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ …pe… no paṭikkamo.
sn35:87.3.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyya; evameva kho, āvuso, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
sn35:87.3.5: Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ …pe… no paṭikkamo.
sn35:87.3.6: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṃ parikanteyya; evameva kho adhimattā vātā kucchiṃ parikantanti.
sn35:87.3.7: Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ …pe… no paṭikkamo.
sn35:87.3.8: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṃ samparitāpeyyuṃ; evameva kho, āvuso, adhimatto kāyasmiṃ ḍāho.
sn35:87.3.9: Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo.
sn35:87.3.10: Satthaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, āharissāmi, nāvakaṅkhāmi jīvitan”ti.
sn35:87.4.2: Yāpetāyasmā channo, yāpentaṃ mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ icchāma.
sn35:87.4.3: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni, ahaṃ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhojanāni pariyesissāmi.
sn35:87.4.4: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni, ahaṃ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhesajjāni pariyesissāmi.
sn35:87.4.5: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi.
sn35:87.4.7: Yāpetāyasmā channo, yāpentaṃ mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ icchāmā”ti.
sn35:87.5.1: “Na me, āvuso sāriputta, natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni;
sn35:87.5.7: Api ca me, āvuso, satthā pariciṇṇo dīgharattaṃ manāpeneva, no amanāpena.
sn35:87.5.8: Etañhi, āvuso, sāvakassa patirūpaṃ yaṃ satthāraṃ paricareyya manāpeneva, no amanāpena.
sn35:87.5.9: ‘Anupavajjaṃ channo bhikkhu satthaṃ āharissatī’ti—evametaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, dhārehī”ti.
sn35:87.6.1: “Puccheyyāma mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ kañcideva desaṃ, sace āyasmā channo okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
sn35:87.7.1: “Cakkhuṃ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasi …pe…
sn35:87.7.2: jivhaṃ, āvuso channa, jivhāviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasi …pe…
sn35:87.7.3: manaṃ, āvuso channa, manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35:87.8.1: “Cakkhuṃ, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi …pe…
sn35:87.8.2: jivhaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, jivhāviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi …pe…
sn35:87.8.3: manaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmī”ti.
sn35:87.9.1: “Cakkhusmiṃ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṃ disvā kiṃ abhiññāya cakkhuṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasi …
sn35:87.9.2: jivhāya, āvuso channa, jivhāviññāṇe jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṃ disvā kiṃ abhiññāya jivhaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasi …
sn35:87.9.3: manasmiṃ, āvuso channa, manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṃ disvā kiṃ abhiññāya manaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35:87.10.1: “Cakkhusmiṃ, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṃ disvā nirodhaṃ abhiññāya cakkhuṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi …pe…
sn35:87.10.2: jivhāya, āvuso sāriputta, jivhāviññāṇe jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṃ disvā nirodhaṃ abhiññāya jivhaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi …pe…
sn35:87.10.3: manasmiṃ, āvuso sāriputta, manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṃ disvā nirodhaṃ abhiññāya manaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmī”ti.
sn35:87.11.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā mahācundo āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:87.11.2: “tasmātiha, āvuso channa, idampi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ niccakappaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ:
sn35:87.11.8: Cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena.
sn35:87.12.1: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmantaṃ channaṃ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn35:87.12.2: Atha kho āyasmā channo acirapakkantesu tesu āyasmantesu satthaṃ āharesi.
sn35:87.13.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:87.13.4: “Nanu te, sāriputta, channena bhikkhunā sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatā”ti?
sn35:87.13.7: “Honti hete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.
sn35:87.13.8: Na kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, ettāvatā saupavajjoti vadāmi.
sn35:87.13.9: Yo kho, sāriputta, tañca kāyaṃ nikkhipati, aññañca kāyaṃ upādiyati, tamahaṃ saupavajjoti vadāmi.
sn35:88.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā puṇṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:88.1.2: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35:88.2.1: “Santi kho, puṇṇa, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:88.2.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35:88.2.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35:88.2.6: santi kho, puṇṇa, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:88.2.7: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35:88.2.8: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35:88.3.1: Santi kho, puṇṇa, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:88.3.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nirujjhati nandī.
sn35:88.3.4: santi kho, puṇṇa, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:88.3.5: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nirujjhati nandī.
sn35:88.4.1: Iminā tvaṃ, puṇṇa, mayā saṃkhittena ovādena ovadito katamasmiṃ janapade viharissasī”ti?
sn35:88.4.2: “Atthi, bhante, sunāparanto nāma janapado, tatthāhaṃ viharissāmī”ti.
sn35:88.5.3: Sace taṃ, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā akkosissanti paribhāsissanti, tatra te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35:88.6.1: “Sace maṃ, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā akkosissanti paribhāsissanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35:88.6.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime pāṇinā pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
sn35:88.7.1: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā pāṇinā pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35:88.8.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā pāṇinā pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35:88.8.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
sn35:88.9.1: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35:88.10.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35:88.10.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime daṇḍena pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
sn35:88.11.1: “Sace pana puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā daṇḍena pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35:88.12.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā daṇḍena pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35:88.12.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime satthena pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
sn35:88.13.1: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā satthena pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35:88.14.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā satthena pahāraṃ dassanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35:88.14.2: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ maṃ nayime tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropentī’ti.
sn35:88.15.1: “Sace pana taṃ, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropessanti, tatra pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
sn35:88.16.1: “Sace maṃ, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropessanti, tatra me evaṃ bhavissati:
sn35:88.16.2: ‘santi kho tassa bhagavato sāvakā kāyena ca jīvitena ca aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā satthahārakaṃ pariyesanti, taṃ me idaṃ apariyiṭṭhaññeva satthahārakaṃ laddhan’ti.
sn35:88.17.2: Sakkhissasi kho tvaṃ, puṇṇa, iminā damūpasamena samannāgato sunāparantasmiṃ janapade vatthuṃ.
sn35:88.18.1: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo bhagavato vacanaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sunāparanto janapado tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
sn35:88.18.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sunāparanto janapado tadavasari.
sn35:88.18.3: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā puṇṇo sunāparantasmiṃ janapade viharati.
sn35:88.18.4: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo tenevantaravassena pañcamattāni upāsakasatāni paṭivedesi.
sn35:88.19.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn35:88.19.2: “yo so, bhante, puṇṇo nāma kulaputto bhagavatā saṅkhittena ovādena ovadito, so kālaṅkato.
sn35:88.20.1: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, puṇṇo kulaputto, paccapādi dhammassānudhammaṃ, na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ vihesesi.
sn35:89.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā bāhiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā bāhiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:89.1.2: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35:89.4.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:89.6.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:89.9.4: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:89.11.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:89.13.1: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn35:89.15.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, bāhiya, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati …pe…
sn35:89.15.2: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35:89.15.3: Nibbindaṃ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati; vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
sn35:89.15.4: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:89.16.1: Atha kho āyasmā bāhiyo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn35:89.16.2: Atha kho āyasmā bāhiyo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn35:89.16.3: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn35:89.16.4: Aññataro ca panāyasmā bāhiyo arahataṃ ahosīti.
sn35:90.1.1: “Ejā, bhikkhave, rogo, ejā gaṇḍo, ejā sallaṃ.
sn35:90.1.2: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, tathāgato anejo viharati vītasallo.
sn35:90.1.3: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cepi ākaṅkheyya ‘anejo vihareyyaṃ vītasallo’ti,
sn35:90.1.4: cakkhuṃ na maññeyya, cakkhusmiṃ na maññeyya, cakkhuto na maññeyya, cakkhu meti na maññeyya;
sn35:90.1.5: rūpe na maññeyya, rūpesu na maññeyya, rūpato na maññeyya, rūpā meti na maññeyya;
sn35:90.1.6: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na maññeyya, cakkhuviññāṇasmiṃ na maññeyya, cakkhuviññāṇato na maññeyya, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ meti na maññeyya;
sn35:90.1.7: cakkhusamphassaṃ na maññeyya, cakkhusamphassasmiṃ na maññeyya, cakkhusamphassato na maññeyya, cakkhusamphasso meti na maññeyya.
sn35:90.1.8: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññeyya, tasmimpi na maññeyya, tatopi na maññeyya, taṃ meti na maññeyya.
sn35:90.2.3: jivhaṃ na maññeyya, jivhāya na maññeyya, jivhāto na maññeyya, jivhā meti na maññeyya;
sn35:90.2.7: yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññeyya, tasmimpi na maññeyya, tatopi na maññeyya, taṃ meti na maññeyya.
sn35:90.3.2: manaṃ na maññeyya, manasmiṃ na maññeyya, manato na maññeyya, mano meti na maññeyya;
sn35:90.3.6: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññeyya, tasmimpi na maññeyya, tatopi na maññeyya, taṃ meti na maññeyya;
sn35:90.3.7: sabbaṃ na maññeyya, sabbasmiṃ na maññeyya, sabbato na maññeyya, sabbaṃ meti na maññeyya.
sn35:90.4.1: So evaṃ amaññamāno na kiñcipi loke upādiyati.
sn35:90.4.2: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassati. Aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn35:90.4.3: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:91.1.1: “Ejā, bhikkhave, rogo, ejā gaṇḍo, ejā sallaṃ.
sn35:91.1.2: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, tathāgato anejo viharati vītasallo.
sn35:91.1.3: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cepi ākaṅkheyya ‘anejo vihareyyaṃ vītasallo’ti,
sn35:91.1.4: cakkhuṃ na maññeyya, cakkhusmiṃ na maññeyya, cakkhuto na maññeyya, cakkhu meti na maññeyya;
sn35:91.1.8: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññeyya, tasmimpi na maññeyya, tatopi na maññeyya, taṃ meti na maññeyya.
sn35:91.1.9: Yañhi, bhikkhave, maññati, yasmiṃ maññati, yato maññati, yaṃ meti maññati, tato taṃ hoti aññathā.
sn35:91.2.1: Jivhaṃ na maññeyya, jivhāya na maññeyya, jivhāto na maññeyya, jivhā meti na maññeyya;
sn35:91.2.5: yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññeyya, tasmimpi na maññeyya, tatopi na maññeyya, taṃ meti na maññeyya.
sn35:91.2.6: Yañhi, bhikkhave, maññati, yasmiṃ maññati, yato maññati, yaṃ meti maññati, tato taṃ hoti aññathā. Aññathābhāvī bhavasatto loko bhavameva abhinandati …pe….
sn35:91.3.1: Manaṃ na maññeyya, manasmiṃ na maññeyya, manato na maññeyya, mano meti na maññeyya …
sn35:91.3.4: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññeyya, tasmimpi na maññeyya, tatopi na maññeyya, taṃ meti na maññeyya.
sn35:91.3.5: Yañhi, bhikkhave, maññati, yasmiṃ maññati, yato maññati, yaṃ meti maññati, tato taṃ hoti aññathā.
sn35:91.4.1: Yāvatā, bhikkhave, khandhadhātuāyatanā tampi na maññeyya, tasmimpi na maññeyya, tatopi na maññeyya, taṃ meti na maññeyya.
sn35:91.4.2: So evaṃ amaññamāno na kiñci loke upādiyati.
sn35:91.4.3: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassati. Aparitassaṃ paccattaññeva parinibbāyati.
sn35:91.4.4: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
sn35:92.1.4: Cakkhuñceva rūpā ca, sotañceva saddā ca, ghānañceva gandhā ca, jivhā ceva rasā ca, kāyo ceva phoṭṭhabbā ca, mano ceva dhammā ca—
sn35:92.2.2: ‘ahametaṃ dvayaṃ paccakkhāya aññaṃ dvayaṃ paññapessāmī’ti, tassa vācāvatthukamevassa.
sn35:93.1.2: Kathañca, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ paṭicca viññāṇaṃ sambhoti?
sn35:93.1.3: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
sn35:93.1.6: Itthetaṃ dvayaṃ calañceva byathañca aniccaṃ vipariṇāmi aññathābhāvi.
sn35:93.1.8: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
sn35:93.1.9: Aniccaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, paccayaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ kuto niccaṃ bhavissati.
sn35:93.1.10: Yā kho, bhikkhave, imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅgati sannipāto samavāyo, ayaṃ vuccati cakkhusamphasso.
sn35:93.1.12: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo cakkhusamphassassa uppādāya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
sn35:93.1.13: Aniccaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, paccayaṃ paṭicca uppanno cakkhusamphasso kuto nicco bhavissati.
sn35:93.1.14: Phuṭṭho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phuṭṭho ceteti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti.
sn35:93.1.15: Itthetepi dhammā calā ceva byathā ca aniccā vipariṇāmino aññathābhāvino …pe…
sn35:93.2.1: Jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṃ.
sn35:93.2.4: Itthetaṃ dvayaṃ calañceva byathañca aniccaṃ vipariṇāmi aññathābhāvi.
sn35:93.2.6: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo jivhāviññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
sn35:93.2.7: Aniccaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, paccayaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ, kuto niccaṃ bhavissati.
sn35:93.2.8: Yā kho, bhikkhave, imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅgati sannipāto samavāyo, ayaṃ vuccati jivhāsamphasso.
sn35:93.2.10: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo jivhāsamphassassa uppādāya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
sn35:93.2.11: Aniccaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, paccayaṃ paṭicca uppanno jivhāsamphasso, kuto nicco bhavissati.
sn35:93.2.12: Phuṭṭho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phuṭṭho ceteti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti.
sn35:93.2.13: Itthetepi dhammā calā ceva byathā ca aniccā vipariṇāmino aññathābhāvino …pe…
sn35:93.3.1: Manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ.
sn35:93.3.4: Itthetaṃ dvayaṃ calañceva byathañca aniccaṃ vipariṇāmi aññathābhāvi.
sn35:93.3.6: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo manoviññāṇassa uppādāya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
sn35:93.3.7: Aniccaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, paccayaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ, kuto niccaṃ bhavissati.
sn35:93.3.8: Yā kho, bhikkhave, imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅgati sannipāto samavāyo, ayaṃ vuccati manosamphasso.
sn35:93.3.10: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo manosamphassassa uppādāya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī.
sn35:93.3.11: Aniccaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, paccayaṃ paṭicca uppanno manosamphasso, kuto nicco bhavissati.
sn35:93.3.12: Phuṭṭho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phuṭṭho ceteti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti.
sn35:93.3.13: Itthetepi dhammā calā ceva byathā ca aniccā vipariṇāmino aññathābhāvino.
sn35:93.3.14: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ paṭicca viññāṇaṃ sambhotī”ti.
sn35:94.1.2: “Chayime, bhikkhave, phassāyatanā adantā aguttā arakkhitā asaṃvutā dukkhādhivāhā honti.
sn35:94.1.4: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, phassāyatanaṃ adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ dukkhādhivāhaṃ hoti …pe…
sn35:94.1.5: jivhā, bhikkhave, phassāyatanaṃ adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ dukkhādhivāhaṃ hoti …pe…
sn35:94.1.6: mano, bhikkhave, phassāyatanaṃ adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ dukkhādhivāhaṃ hoti.
sn35:94.1.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha phassāyatanā adantā aguttā arakkhitā asaṃvutā dukkhādhivāhā honti”.
sn35:94.2.1: Chayime, bhikkhave, phassāyatanā sudantā suguttā surakkhitā susaṃvutā sukhādhivāhā honti.
sn35:94.2.3: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, phassāyatanaṃ sudantaṃ suguttaṃ surakkhitaṃ susaṃvutaṃ sukhādhivāhaṃ hoti …pe…
sn35:94.2.4: jivhā, bhikkhave, phassāyatanaṃ sudantaṃ suguttaṃ surakkhitaṃ susaṃvutaṃ sukhādhivāhaṃ hoti …pe…
sn35:94.2.5: mano, bhikkhave, phassāyatanaṃ sudantaṃ suguttaṃ surakkhitaṃ susaṃvutaṃ sukhādhivāhaṃ hoti.
sn35:94.2.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha phassāyatanā sudantā suguttā surakkhitā susaṃvutā sukhādhivāhā hontī”ti.
sn35:95.1.1: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35:95.1.2: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35:95.2.1: “Ettha dāni, mālukyaputta, kiṃ dahare bhikkhū vakkhāma.
sn35:95.2.2: Yatra hi nāma tvaṃ, bhikkhu, jiṇṇo vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto saṅkhittena ovādaṃ yācasī”ti.
sn35:95.3.1: “Kiñcāpāhaṃ, bhante, jiṇṇo vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto.
sn35:95.3.2: Desetu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ, desetu sugato saṅkhittena dhammaṃ, appeva nāmāhaṃ bhagavato bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājāneyyaṃ. Appeva nāmāhaṃ bhagavato bhāsitassa dāyādo assan”ti.
sn35:95.4.2: ye te cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā adiṭṭhā adiṭṭhapubbā, na ca passasi, na ca te hoti passeyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:95.5.1: “Ye te sotaviññeyyā saddā assutā assutapubbā, na ca suṇāsi, na ca te hoti suṇeyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:95.6.1: “Ye te ghānaviññeyyā gandhā aghāyitā aghāyitapubbā, na ca ghāyasi, na ca te hoti ghāyeyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:95.7.1: “Ye te jivhāviññeyyā rasā asāyitā asāyitapubbā, na ca sāyasi, na ca te hoti sāyeyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:95.8.1: “Ye te kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā asamphuṭṭhā asamphuṭṭhapubbā, na ca phusasi, na ca te hoti phuseyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:95.9.1: “Ye te manoviññeyyā dhammā aviññātā aviññātapubbā, na ca vijānāsi, na ca te hoti vijāneyyanti? Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35:95.10.1: “Ettha ca te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṃ bhavissati, mute mutamattaṃ bhavissati, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati.
sn35:95.10.2: Yato kho te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṃ bhavissati, mute mutamattaṃ bhavissati, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati;
sn35:95.10.7: tato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, nevidha, na huraṃ, na ubhayamantarena.
sn35:95.11.1: “Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi:
sn35:95.36.1: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35:95.36.3: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi:
sn35:95.41.1: Imassa kho, mālukyaputta, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn35:95.42.1: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn35:95.42.2: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn35:95.42.3: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn35:95.42.4: Aññataro ca panāyasmā mālukyaputto arahataṃ ahosīti.
sn35:96.1.1: “Parihānadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi aparihānadhammañca cha ca abhibhāyatanāni.
sn35:96.1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojaniyā.
sn35:96.1.5: Tañce bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gameti, veditabbametaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā:
sn35:96.2.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā uppajjanti …pe…
sn35:96.2.2: puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasā dhammaṃ viññāya uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojaniyā.
sn35:96.2.3: Tañce bhikkhu adhivāseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantīkaroti na anabhāvaṃ gameti, veditabbametaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā:
sn35:96.3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojaniyā.
sn35:96.3.3: Tañce bhikkhu nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti, veditabbametaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā:
sn35:96.4.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā uppajjanti …pe…
sn35:96.4.2: puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasā dhammaṃ viññāya uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojaniyā.
sn35:96.4.3: Tañce bhikkhu nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti, veditabbametaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā:
sn35:96.5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā nuppajjanti pāpakā akusalā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojaniyā.
sn35:96.5.6: puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasā dhammaṃ viññāya nuppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojaniyā.
sn35:97.1.4: Cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ byāsiñcati cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu.
sn35:97.1.12: jivhindriyaṃ asaṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ byāsiñcati jivhāviññeyyesu rasesu,
sn35:97.1.15: manindriyaṃ asaṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ byāsiñcati manoviññeyyesu dhammesu,
sn35:97.2.2: Cakkhundriyaṃ saṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ na byāsiñcati cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu,
sn35:97.2.10: jivhindriyaṃ saṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ na byāsiñcati …pe…
sn35:97.2.12: Manindriyaṃ saṃvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato cittaṃ na byāsiñcati, manoviññeyyesu dhammesu,
sn35:98.1.4: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:98.1.5: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati, veditabbametaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā:
sn35:98.1.9: santi, bhikkhave, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35:98.1.10: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati, veditabbametaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā:
sn35:98.2.2: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.

sn35:99.1.8: ‘Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti …pe…
sn35:99.1.13: ‘yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
sn35:100.1.8: ‘yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
sn35:101.1.2: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.1.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.1.9: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35:101.1.12: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.

sn35:101.1.16: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35:101.1.18: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.2.3: Sā vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.

sn35:101.2.9: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.2.12: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.2.13: Yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35:101.2.14: Taṃ pajahatha. Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati …pe….
sn35:101.3.3: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.3.6: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35:101.3.9: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.3.12: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.3.13: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35:101.3.15: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35:101.4.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yaṃ imasmiṃ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ taṃ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya,
sn35:101.4.3: ‘amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karotī’”ti?
sn35:101.7.1: “Na hi no etaṃ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti.

sn35:102.1.2: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.

sn35:102.1.16: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35:102.1.18: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
